member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.DirectiveProcessorAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Declares the decorated type to be a T4 directive processor
member.param: The public name of the processor.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.DirectiveProcessorAttribute.ProcessorName
member.summary: The public name of the processor.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor
member.summary: Interface for a directive processor.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.Errors
member.summary: Error collection for DirectiveProcessor to add errors/warnings to.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.FinishProcessingRun
member.summary: Finishes a round of directive processing.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.GetClassCodeForProcessingRun
member.summary: Gets the code to contribute to the generated template processing class because of the most recent run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.GetImportsForProcessingRun
member.summary: Gets any namespaces to import because of the most recent run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.GetPostInitializationCodeForProcessingRun
member.summary: Gets the code to contribute to the body of the initialize method of the generated template processing class because of the most recent run. This code will run after the base class' Initialize method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.GetPreInitializationCodeForProcessingRun
member.summary: Gets the code to contribute to the body of the initialize method of the generated template processing class because of the most recent run. This code will run before the base class' Initialize method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.GetReferencesForProcessingRun
member.summary: Gets any references to pass to the compiler because of the most recent run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.GetTemplateClassCustomAttributes
member.summary: Gets any custom attributes to include on the template class.
member.returns: A collection of custom attributes that can be null or empty.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.Initialize(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.ITextTemplatingEngineHost)
member.summary: Initializes the processor instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.IsDirectiveSupported(System.String)
member.summary: Does this DirectiveProcessor support the given directive.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.ProcessDirective(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Processes a directive from a template file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.RequiresProcessingRunIsHostSpecific
member.summary: Allow a directive processor to specify that it needs the run to be host-specific.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.SetProcessingRunIsHostSpecific(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Informs the directive processor whether the run is host-specific.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessor.StartProcessingRun(System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider,System.String,System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection)
member.summary: Starts a round of directive processing.
member.param: The contents of the template being processed.
The collection to report processing errors in.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessorMetadata
member.summary: Metadata provided by DirectiveProcessors. Hosts that want to import DPs via MEF can consume this standard metadata.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessorMetadata.ProcessorName
member.summary: Public name of the processor. Used to resolve the processor for a simple host.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IDirectiveProcessorMetadata.SupportedDirectives
member.summary: Set of directives supported by the processor. Used by more complex hosts to support anonymous directive processors

member.summary: Event fired when transform for all templates has completed.

member.summary: Event fired when transform for all templates is about to start

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.ServiceProviderExtensions
member.summary: Class that contains extensions to IServiceProvider relevant to T4 templates.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.ServiceProviderExtensions.GetCOMService(System.IServiceProvider,System.Type)
member.summary: Attempts to return a service from a remote provider enabled for COM interfacing.
member.returns: The associated service enabled for COM interfacing if it is possible; otherwise whatever the service provider provides. May return null.
member.param: The type of service being requested.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.SupportedDirectiveAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Declares that the decorated T4 directive processor supports the given directive.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.SupportedDirectiveAttribute.SupportedDirectives
member.summary: Contribution to the set of directives supported by the processor. This extra property is required by MEF to build a collection of this name.
